ValidationRule.description: Prevents people from using the "Approve for Payment" button on webinar hosting fees, which do not need to be approved for payment.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL( Payment_Status__c , "Approved") && ISPICKVAL( Expense_Category__c , "Webinar Hosting Fee")
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Webinar Hosting Fees do not need to be approved for payment.
